strategy.rationale: Strategic roles require complex reasoning, brand architecture thinking, and long-term planning capabilities

_comments.usage: This file defines default model mappings used by AIWG MMK deployment scripts
_comments.customization: Users can modify these values to use different models or versions
_comments.location: Place custom models.json in project root to override defaults
_comments.precedence: Project models.json > User ~/.config/aiwg/models.json > AIWG MMK defaults
